segments.text: Hello , Sir . We haven't seen you for quite a while . So , what is it today that we can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need a Deposit Certificate to handle some stuff in land .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , yes , I can do that now . I'm sure you know , as I may have told you before , you should pay an extra 20 RIB handling fee for this service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I recalled you charging that before . And I thought it was extortionate ! Haha !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can just take it from your account , you don't need to give me cash .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... so it'll come out of my account ? Well , that makes it much easier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything else you'll be needing today , Sir ?
segments.speaker: S1
